ygData.subject: Re: War and Peace
ygData.msgSnippet: Astroblasts radar picks up the missiles heading toward him, but not soon enough to dodge both of them. The first missile broadsides him, but he manages to

Astroblasts radar picks up the missiles heading toward him, but 
not soon enough to dodge both of them. The first missile 
broadsides him, but he manages to dodge the second. Then 
coming around he fires three laser blasts from his twin laser 
cannons at Scrap. "Trying to surprise me are you, I don't think so!" 
he says evily.


On 18 Feb 2001, at 6:17, Yanshosh@... wrote:

> Okie. Thanx for telling me, Rdahl.
> 
> ::Firearm/The Galactors::
> 
> Firearm grunts as Wildrider crashes into him, leaving a large crack 
> in Firearm's armor and sending the tank skidding forward slightly. 
> Firearm transforms, stumbling back and nearly falling but being able 
> to regain balance. He looks down at his beat-in chest plate, looking 
> back up and firing two charges at Wildrider. It hurt to move, but 
> Firearm was a warrior, used to pain.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> The jet that was Supernova, Scrap, and Flare appeared on the horizon, 
> heading for the Cybertronian Fire. A cloaked jet, consisting of Vicyr 
> and Slasys, was following it. In seconds, the jets cleared the 
> distance to the CF and could now clearly scan the fighting bots 
> through the ashes.
> 
> "All Alliance bots, this is new Alliance warrior Supernova. We are to 
> assist the Maximals at this battle," he says over his comm to any 
> Alliance members that happened to be at the battle, and then opens 
> his comm to the Maximals.
> 
> "Maximals, me and the other Alliance members are here to help. Do not 
> fire on us." He ends the transmission and then barks a short order to 
> the Galactors. The bigger jet (Supernova and co) seperates and then 
> forms again using only Flare and Scrap, leaving Supernova to land on 
> the ground and continue toward the Cybertronian Fire on foot.
> 
> The jets get into range of the CF, one of them firing two missiles at 
> Astroblast and the other four heavy-plasma shots at him. Supernova 
> arrives at the battle, firing his laser rifle at Wildrider.
> 
> 
> 
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., Robert Dahl <rdahl@s...> wrote:
> > Motormaster smacks his head with his hand at the new noise of 
> Squawktalks
> > voice. He looks to Drag Strip, who looks pretty banged up. "Report" 
> he
> > barks the order without any emotion. Drag Strip, coasts on the 
> air "well
> > sir, many Maximals have joined the fray, and we are outnumbered, 
> but their
> > defences are weak from an attack that's already hapened, this is our
> > chance". "Good" Smiles Motormaster, "Stunticons, transform and 
> attack.
> > Squawtalk, Beastbox" he barks tossing out Beastbox, "pick off the
> > Straglers" at that Motormaster Speedbreaker and Dead-End jump out of
> > Astroblast, and soar towards the ground, a bit away from the battle.
> > Astroblast follows them.
> > 
> > The small pink cassette of Beastbox transfroms into his Gorilla 
> mode, but
> > starts to plummet like a rock, (he cant fly, hint Soulstice).
> 
> 
> 
> 
>
